column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////The ambiance here is amazing. The restrooms alone
column2: gorgeous. Everything is high-end and custom from the purse hooks under the bar to the monogram bar stools. But I have to say the most amazing experience here was
column6: they will transform your very reality by redefining what fried potato should taste like. Everything else's was good - we had short rib and the pulled pork but they were both way too heavy. A smaller portion of meet balanced with some veg would be most welcome. Otherwise
column7: the whole waitstaff at one point or another stopped by and we were well taken cared of. Yum. Would come here again.
